name: Alex
description: Oversees the entire event planning process, manages the team, and ensures that all tasks are completed on time.

name: Taylorn
description: Plans and schedules the event program, including workshops, seminars, and keynote sessions.

name: Cameron
description: Handles audiovisual equipment, live streaming, and technical aspects of the event.

name: Rowan
description: Recruits and manages event volunteers, assigning tasks and schedules.

name: Kennedy
description: Captures photos and videos of the event for documentation and promotion.

name: Phoenix
description: Reviews the event's success, analyzes data, and prepares a post-event report.
